p: Harpagide 5-O-β-D-Glucopyranoside (C 12H 34O 15; Figure S1): IR (KBr) V max: 3375 (OH), 2922, 2852 (C-H Str), 1461 (C = C, 1040 (C-O) cm −1; 1H NMR (500 MHz, CD 3OD) δ: 7.90 (1H, d, H-3), 5.80 (1H, d, H-1), 4.85 (1H, d, J = 5.0 Hz, H-4), 4.90 (1H, t, H-6), 1.90 (2H, dd, H-7), 2.30 (1H, d, H-9), 4.55 (1H, d, H-1ˈ), 3.90 (1H, m, H-6ˈˈa), 3.75-3.60 (4H, m, H-6ˈb, H-6ˈˈb, H-3ˈ, H-3ˈˈ), 3.45-3.30 (4H, m, H-4ˈ, H-4ˈˈ, H-5ˈ, H-5ˈˈ), 3.25-3.16 (2H, dd, J = 1.5, 1.5 Hz, H-2ˈ; H-2ˈˈ), 3.95 (2H, m, H-6ˈa, H-6ˈˈa). EI-MS: m/z 368 FAB-MS: m/z 549 calculated for [M + Na] +, that is C 12H 34O 15Na. Fragment of de-glucosidated at m/z 387.21 corresponds to [M – Gluc + 2H] + calculated for C 15H 24O 10.
